front.title: TLS 1.3 Authentication using ETSI TS 103 097 and IEEE 1609.2 certificates

abstract.t: This document specifies the use of two new certificate types to authenticate TLS entities. The first type enables the use of a certificate specified by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) [IEEE1609.2] and the second by the European Telecommunications Standards Institute (ETSI) [TS103097].
